articles.title: Rocket Lab Price Target Hiked, Launches To Expand Next Year
articles.mainIdea: Rocket Lab Price Target Hiked, Launches To Expand Next Year
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Rocket Lab Price Target Hiked, Launches To Expand Next Year. Stifel raises its price target on RKLB stock after defense satellite award. Rocket Lab completes 21st Electron launch of 2025. Related tickers mentioned: LMT, RKLB.

articles.title: Starlab Closes Credit Facility
articles.summary: Business Wire: Starlab Closes Credit Facility. HOUSTON, December 22, 2025--Starlab Space LLC closed a credit facility led by Texas Capital. Related tickers mentioned: EADSF, MDALF, MSBHF, PLTR, VOYG.

articles.title: Northrop Grumman Corp. (NOC) Secures $100M Missile Weapon System Contract as Analyst Optimism Grows
articles.mainIdea: Northrop Grumman Corp. (NOC) Secures $100M Missile Weapon System Contract as Analyst Optimism Grows
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Northrop Grumman Corp. (NOC) Secures $100M Missile Weapon System Contract as Analyst Optimism Grows. Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) is one of the best aerospace and defense stocks to buy, according to Wall Street analysts. On December 12, Citi initiated coverage of Northrop Grumman with a Buy rating and a $654 price target. The firm also began coverage on 24 aerospace and defense names, pointing to strong long-term trends across [â€¦] Related tickers mentioned: BA, GE, RTX.
